landing.heroDescription: Generate comprehensive business and technical strategies tailored to your specific idea using our advanced AI technology. Special focus on Syrian market data and regional opportunities.
landing.aboutDescription: Planlyze AI is your intelligent business strategist that transforms your software ideas into actionable plans. Powered by advanced artificial intelligence and enriched with comprehensive Syrian market data, our platform delivers personalized business strategies and technical roadmaps in minutes.
landing.feature1Desc: Get detailed market analysis, competitor research, and revenue models tailored to your specific industry and target market.
landing.feature2Desc: Receive comprehensive technical specifications, technology stack recommendations, and development roadmaps.
landing.feature3Desc: Access specialized insights about Syrian market conditions, local opportunities, and regional business landscapes.
landing.feature4Desc: Get step-by-step implementation plans with timelines, milestones, and resource requirements.
landing.feature5Desc: Get detailed financial forecasts, revenue models, and cost analysis for your business idea.
landing.feature6Desc: Understand your competitive landscape with detailed analysis of market players and positioning strategies.
landing.partnersTitle: Our Partners Through Guidance And Training
landing.partnersSubtitle: Join the ecosystem of innovation and growth
landing.benefit1Desc: The only AI tool specifically trained on Syrian market data, regulations, and business opportunities.
landing.benefit2Desc: Get everything you need: business plan, technical specs, action plan, and pitch deck in one place.
landing.benefit3Desc: Generate comprehensive strategies in minutes, not weeks of manual research and planning.
landing.benefit4Desc: All recommendations backed by real market data, industry trends, and proven methodologies.
landing.step1Desc: Tell us about your software concept and target market
landing.step2Desc: Our AI analyzes your idea against Syrian market data and global trends
landing.step3Desc: Receive complete business strategy and technical plan
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join hundreds of Syrian entrepreneurs who've used Planlyze AI to build successful businesses
landing.pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs
landing.faq1A: Planlyze AI is an AI-powered platform that generates comprehensive business strategies, technical roadmaps, and pitch decks tailored to your specific software idea, with special focus on Syrian market data.
landing.faq2Q: How long does it take to generate a report?
landing.faq2A: Most reports are generated within 2-5 minutes. The AI analyzes your idea, researches market data, and creates a comprehensive strategy document.
landing.faq3Q: Is my business idea kept confidential?
landing.faq3A: Absolutely. We use end-to-end encryption and never share your ideas with third parties. Your data is protected by strict security measures.
landing.faq4Q: What's included in a premium report?
landing.faq4A: Premium reports include competitor analysis, Syrian market data, AI predictions, risk analysis, interactive AI Assistant for Q&A, and export options in PDF and Excel formats.
landing.faq5A: Single credits never expire. Bundle package credits are valid for 12 months from the purchase date.
landing.faq6A: Yes, we offer refunds within 7 days of purchase if you haven't used your credits. Contact our support team for assistance.
landing.faq7Q: What's next after studying my Planlyze report?
landing.faq7A: Your Planlyze report is your strategic foundation. The next steps depend on your goals: you can approach investors with your comprehensive business plan, seek strategic partners to accelerate growth, or proceed directly to market launch with your validated roadmap. We don't provide code—we provide the strategic clarity you need to make informed decisions about your venture's future.
landing.contactSubtitle: Have questions? We're here to help!
landing.footerDesc: Empowering entrepreneurs to turn software ideas into reality with AI-powered strategies and comprehensive education.
landing.privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
landing.privacyPolicy.intro: At Planlyze, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered business strategy platform.
landing.privacyPolicy.section1Content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, business ideas, and any other information you choose to provide when using our platform. We also automatically collect certain information about your device and how you interact with our services.
landing.privacyPolicy.section2Content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to process your requests, to communicate with you, and to develop new features. Your business ideas and strategies are used solely to generate personalized reports and are not shared with third parties.
landing.privacyPolicy.section3Content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard protocols.
landing.privacyPolicy.section4Content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only with service providers who assist us in operating our platform, conducting our business, or serving our users, and only to the extent necessary.
landing.privacyPolicy.section5Content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. You can also opt-out of marketing communications and request a copy of your data. Contact us at info@planlyze.com to exercise these rights.
landing.privacyPolicy.section6Content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our platform and hold certain information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.
landing.privacyPolicy.section7Content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date.
landing.privacyPolicy.section8Content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@planlyze.com or through our support channels.
landing.ideaSecurity.title: Idea Security
landing.ideaSecurity.subtitle: Your Ideas Are Safe With Us
landing.ideaSecurity.intro: We understand that your business ideas are your most valuable assets. At Planlyze, we've implemented comprehensive security measures to ensure your ideas remain confidential and protected.
landing.ideaSecurity.section1Content: All data transmitted between your device and our servers is protected using industry-standard TLS/SSL encryption. Your ideas are encrypted both in transit and at rest, ensuring no unauthorized access.
landing.ideaSecurity.section2Content: We never sell, share, or distribute your business ideas to third parties. Your ideas are used exclusively to generate your personalized reports and are never used to train our AI models or shared with competitors.
landing.ideaSecurity.section3Content: Our platform is hosted on enterprise-grade cloud infrastructure with multiple layers of security, including firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and regular security audits by independent third parties.
landing.ideaSecurity.section4Content: Your data is protected by strict access controls. Only you have access to your ideas and generated reports. Our team members have no access to your confidential business information.
landing.ideaSecurity.section5Content: You have complete control over your data. You can delete your ideas and reports at any time, and they will be permanently removed from our systems within 30 days.
landing.ideaSecurity.section6Content: We comply with international data protection regulations including GDPR. Our security practices are regularly reviewed and updated to meet the highest industry standards.
ideaSecurity.guaranteeItems: 256-bit AES encryption for all stored data
Regular security audits and penetration testing
landing.ideaSecurity.confidentialityContent: We treat every idea submitted to our platform with the highest level of confidentiality. All our employees and contractors sign strict non-disclosure agreements. We understand the competitive nature of business and take every measure to protect your intellectual property.
landing.ideaSecurity.contactContent: If you have any questions about our security measures or need to report a security concern, please contact our security team at info@planlyze.com
